verses.text_plain: The word that Isaiah the son of Amoz saw concerning Judah and Jerusalem.
verses.verse_html: 1The word that Isaiah the son of Amoz saw concerning Judah and Jerusalem.

verses.text_plain: And it shall come to pass in the last days, that the mountain of the Lord’s house shall be established in the top of the mountains, and shall be exalted above the hills; and all nations shall flow unto it.
verses.verse_html:
2And it shall come to pass in the last days, that the mountain of the Lord’s house shall be established in the top of the mountains, and shall be exalted above the hills; and all nations shall flow unto it. ▼
▼ established: or, prepared

tokens.text: And it shall come to pass in the last

verses.text_plain: And many people shall go and say, Come ye, and let us go up to the mountain of the Lord, to the house of the God of Jacob; and he will teach us of his ways, and we will walk in his paths: for out of Zion shall go forth the law, and the word of the Lord from Jerusalem.
verses.verse_html: 3And many people shall go and say, Come ye, and let us go up to the mountain of the Lord, to the house of the God of Jacob; and he will teach us of his ways, and we will walk in his paths: for out of Zion shall go forth the law, and the word of the Lord from Jerusalem.

tokens.text: ye, and let us go up

verses.text_plain: And he shall judge among the nations, and shall rebuke many people: and they shall beat their swords into plowshares, and their spears into pruninghooks: nation shall not lift up sword against nation, neither shall they learn war any more.
verses.verse_html:
4And he shall judge among the nations, and shall rebuke many people: and they shall beat their swords into plowshares, and their spears into pruninghooks: nation shall not lift up sword against nation, neither shall they learn war any more. ▼
▼ pruninghooks: or, scythes

verses.text_plain: O house of Jacob, come ye, and let us walk in the light of the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 5O house of Jacob, come ye, and let us walk in the light of the Lord.

verses.text_plain: Therefore thou hast forsaken thy people the house of Jacob, because they be replenished from the east, and are soothsayers like the Philistines, and they please themselves in the children of strangers.
verses.verse_html:
6Therefore thou hast forsaken thy people the house of Jacob, because they be replenished from the east, and are soothsayers like the Philistines, and they please themselves in the children of strangers. ▼
▼ from…: or, more than the
 , ▼
▼ please…: or, abound with the

footnotes.body_html: ▼ from…: or, more than the
▼ please…: or, abound with the

verses.text_plain: Their land also is full of silver and gold, neither is there any end of their treasures; their land is also full of horses, neither is there any end of their chariots:
verses.verse_html: 7Their land also is full of silver and gold, neither is there any end of their treasures; their land is also full of horses, neither is there any end of their chariots:

verses.text_plain: Their land also is full of idols; they worship the work of their own hands, that which their own fingers have made:
verses.verse_html: 8Their land also is full of idols; they worship the work of their own hands, that which their own fingers have made:

verses.text_plain: And the mean man boweth down, and the great man humbleth himself: therefore forgive them not.
verses.verse_html: 9And the mean man boweth down, and the great man humbleth himself: therefore forgive them not.

verses.text_plain: Enter into the rock, and hide thee in the dust, for fear of the Lord, and for the glory of his majesty.
verses.verse_html: 10Enter into the rock, and hide thee in the dust, for fear of the Lord, and for the glory of his majesty.

verses.text_plain: The lofty looks of man shall be humbled, and the haughtiness of men shall be bowed down, and the Lord alone shall be exalted in that day.
verses.verse_html: 11The lofty looks of man shall be humbled, and the haughtiness of men shall be bowed down, and the Lord alone shall be exalted in that day.

verses.text_plain: For the day of the Lord of hosts shall be upon every one that is proud and lofty, and upon every one that is lifted up; and he shall be brought low:
verses.verse_html: 12For the day of the Lord of hosts shall be upon every one that is proud and lofty, and upon every one that is lifted up; and he shall be brought low:

tokens.text: and he shall be brought low

verses.text_plain: And upon all the cedars of Lebanon, that are high and lifted up, and upon all the oaks of Bashan,
verses.verse_html: 13And upon all the cedars of Lebanon, that are high and lifted up, and upon all the oaks of Bashan,

verses.text_plain: And upon all the high mountains, and upon all the hills that are lifted up,
verses.verse_html: 14And upon all the high mountains, and upon all the hills that are lifted up,

verses.text_plain: And upon every high tower, and upon every fenced wall,
verses.verse_html: 15And upon every high tower, and upon every fenced wall,

verses.text_plain: And upon all the ships of Tarshish, and upon all pleasant pictures.
verses.verse_html:
16And upon all the ships of Tarshish, and upon all pleasant pictures. ▼
▼ pleasant…: Heb. pictures of desire

footnotes.body_html: ▼ pleasant…: Heb. pictures of desire

verses.text_plain: And the loftiness of man shall be bowed down, and the haughtiness of men shall be made low: and the Lord alone shall be exalted in that day.
verses.verse_html: 17And the loftiness of man shall be bowed down, and the haughtiness of men shall be made low: and the Lord alone shall be exalted in that day.

verses.text_plain: And the idols he shall utterly abolish.
verses.verse_html:
18And the idols he shall utterly abolish. ▼
▼ he…: or, shall utterly pass away

footnotes.body_text: ▼ he…: or, shall utterly pass away
footnotes.body_html: ▼ he…: or, shall utterly pass away

verses.text_plain: And they shall go into the holes of the rocks, and into the caves of the earth, for fear of the Lord, and for the glory of his majesty, when he ariseth to shake terribly the earth.
verses.verse_html:
19And they shall go into the holes of the rocks, and into the caves of the earth, for fear of the Lord, and for the glory of his majesty, when he ariseth to shake terribly the earth. ▼
▼ of the earth: Heb. of the dust

footnotes.body_text: ▼ of the earth: Heb. of the dust
footnotes.body_html: ▼ of the earth: Heb. of the dust

verses.text_plain: In that day a man shall cast his idols of silver, and his idols of gold, which they made each one for himself to worship, to the moles and to the bats;
verses.verse_html:
20In that day a man shall cast his idols of silver, and his idols of gold, which they made each one for himself to worship, to the moles and to the bats; ▼
▼ his idols of silver…: Heb. the idols of his silver, etc
 , ▼
▼ each…: or, for him

footnotes.body_text: ▼ his idols of silver…: Heb. the idols of his silver, etc
footnotes.body_html: ▼ his idols of silver…: Heb. the idols of his silver, etc
▼ each…: or, for him

verses.text_plain: To go into the clefts of the rocks, and into the tops of the ragged rocks, for fear of the Lord, and for the glory of his majesty, when he ariseth to shake terribly the earth.
verses.verse_html: 21To go into the clefts of the rocks, and into the tops of the ragged rocks, for fear of the Lord, and for the glory of his majesty, when he ariseth to shake terribly the earth.

verses.text_plain: Cease ye from man, whose breath is in his nostrils: for wherein is he to be accounted of?
verses.verse_html: 22Cease ye from man, whose breath is in his nostrils: for wherein is he to be accounted of?

tokens.text: for wherein is he to be accounted of
